item.title: Practice Class 1
item.author: Author
item.description: Basic Types and Operations 1. Int, long int and long are both types for representing integers(positive or negative) Mathematically, integer set is closed under + - * but not /. (/: 向零取整) In Java, when there is decimals, down cast to the closed integer. Assignments: = 2. Float/double float and double are Java representations of real numbers. 3. char and characters in your program Represents a CHARacter (English letter, or digits, or punctuation)
